strings.Value: "Who are you?"
"What is it you sell?"
"Who might you recommend I meet here?"
"I've heard few curious words — 'Bloodbrush extract'... and that you're no ordinary salesman, and your wares are far from mundane."
"Farewell."
[Attack] "Die, you dirty thief!"
"Have you ever tried this bloodbrush extract?"
"How about you stay away from that junk, all right? It kills pretty fast, and I need you alive."
"That's out of the question. In fact, get away from him!"
"Reg, leave the poor guy alone! Let's go have some wine instead!"

{n}The gnome's yellow, bloodshot eyes scan the faces in the room nervously. Noticing you, he grabs for his sealed sheath.{/n} "What?! Who are you? Oh, it's Your Royal Highness? Forgive me, I... I didn't recognize you. An honor. Truly, a huge honor. I'm... I'm Kharne Vereel, a simple salesman."
{n}The gnome looks at you, suspicion in his little yellow eyes.{/n} "You again?! I mean, what can I do for you, Your Highness?"
"I told you already!" {n}The gnome's voice rises in anger.{/n} "I'm a simple salesman! Not rich, not noble... Why would a {mf|king|queen} concern {mf|him|her}self with me? {mf|He|She} wouldn't!"
"What do you care?! Fish, and the like."
"No one! Everyone! How should I know?! I'm just a simple salesman. Leave me be!"

"Quiet! Quiet, I say!" {n}Gripping his sheath tightly, the gnome looks around anxiously before whispering,{/n} "Too many people here... Too many eyes, ears... You want to talk business, find me out in {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g}. I... I'll remember you!"
"Yes, yes, Your Highness. A great honor... Go, have fun!"
"You got any of that stuff on you? Just a little bit?" {n}Regongar whispers suggestively, winking to the gnome.{/n}
"Nah, never — so that's why I want to try it! Why not? We only live once!"
{n}The half-orc mumbles,{/n} "Yeah, sure you do... Who needs me at all? This way I'd at least die from pleasure, instead of a sword..."
"Die wherever you want, just keep away from me! I told you, I've got nothing!"
"Fine, fine... just asking!" {n}Regongar turns away resentfully.{/n}
"Wine? Now that's an idea... Ha ha, fine, let's go do it! Ha, gnome, I thought you knew your business! Who turns away buyers?"
"I do! I told you I got nothing! Now leave me alone! Out! Get out of here!"
